TABLE_ROW.TABLE_FIELD: &nbsp; Admin access &nbsp; Your website allows you to have unlimited number of administrators â€“ pe - 9156

{"editable":"id=\"admin\" name=\"admin\"vicon, creating posts or adding new products and services are some of the functions users are able to perform when they have admin access to the website.C/p

CpThe direct link to your administrative backend of your website is on Ca href=\"/pc-admin\"Control PanelC/a. By default, only the website developer&nbsp;would have access to the website admin panel to update the website&nbsp;but he could grant as many individuals as needed access to do the same tasks.C/p

Cp&nbsp;C/p

Cul
	Cli
	CpCstrongRequest admin accessC/strongCbr
	Cbr
	To be able to gain admin access to the website so you could update the website, you should request admin access. Only current admin users are able to grant admin access to others. If you are in doubt who would give you access to the website, you should talk to your website or service providers as they should have the capacity to do this for you. Meanwhile, any other person with admin access could create other admin users. Request Admin Access by following the link below.Cbr
	Cbr
	Ca class=\"pc-btn\" href=\"/widgets/Application_User_Creator/notify_us/create\" target=\"_blank\"Request Admin AccessC/aCbr
	Cbr
	All current admin will now be notified of your request and they would grant you access easily with a few clicksCbr
	&nbsp;C/p
	C/li
	Cli
	CpCstrongVisit Control PanelC/strongCbr
	Cbr
	You are able to administer your website from any internet enabled device where ever you are. Updates you make on the website would take effect immediately in real-time.Cbr
	Cbr
	Ca class=\"pc-btn\" href=\"/pc-admin\" target=\"_blank\"Go to Control PanelC/aC/p
	C/li
	Cli
	CpCstrongGranting Others Admin AccessC/strongCbr
	Cbr
	Any admin can grant admin access to other registered users of the website. Follow the following instructionsCpAsk the individuals to create an account and request for admin access by filling this form:&nbsp;Ca href=\"/widgets/Application_User_Creator/notify_us/create\" target=\"_blank\"Request Admin Access - {{{pc_domain}}}/widgets/Application_User_Creator/notify_us/createC/aC/p
		C/li
		Cli
		CpGo to \"Ca href=\"/pc-admin/Application_User_List\"UsersC/a\" under Control Panel and locate the email address of the user you want to give admin access toC/p
		C/li
		Cli
		CpClick \"options\" then under the options that appear click \"Update Account\"&nbsp;C/p
		C/li
		Cli
		CpOn the Pop Up, set the \"Access Level\" to \"Owner\" and save the settingsCbr
		Cbr
		Ca class=\"pc-btn\" href=\"/pc-admin/Application_User_List\" style=\"word-spacing: 0px;\" target=\"_blank\"Go to UsersC/aC/p
		C/li
	C/ul
	C/li
C/ul

Cdiv&nbsp;C/div

Ch2Ca id=\"emails\" name=\"emails\"Corporate EmailsC/aC/h2

Cp&nbsp;C/p

CpFully hosted websites come with corporate emails and it is very likely that there is capacity for you to create emails like example@{{{pc_domain}}}. Only requirement in managing email accounts is Admin Access. If you don't have admin access and you would like to create a corporate email @{{{pc_domain}}}, you would need to either request admin access or ask someone who has the access to help create the email accounts you need. The email service for PageCarton websites are provided by ComeRiver Mail.C/p

Cp&nbsp;C/p

Cul
	CliCstrongCreating Email AccountC/strongCbr
	Cbr
	Creating a new email is as easy as just few clicks. Follow the link below to create new emails:Cbr
	Cbr
	Ca class=\"pc-btn\" href=\"/pc-admin/Application_User_Email_Creator\" target=\"_blank\"Create a new email account&nbsp;@{{{pc_domain}}}C/aCbr
	&nbsp;C/li
	CliCstrongManaging Existing EmailsC/strongCbr
	Cbr
	Change passwords, delete emails and manage generally all the email accounts linked to this website using a web interface. Follow the link below to manage email accounts.&nbsp;Cbr
	Cbr
	Ca class=\"pc-btn\" href=\"/pc-admin/Application_User_Email_List\" target=\"_blank\"Manage existing email accountsC/aCbr
	&nbsp;C/li
	CliCstrongSending &amp; Receiving EmailsC/strongCbr
	Cbr
	You have several options of checking your emails. The easiest to set you is to use our webmail interface to check your email. But you can as well integrate the email account to any digital device like your mobile phones and/or computer.&nbsp;Cbr
	Cbr
	&nbsp;
	Cul
		CliAccess Mail Through the WebCbr
		Cbr
		This is especially useful because you could have your email anywhere you are around the world. So far you have access to the internet. Using any web browser, visit Ca href=\"https://mail.comeriver.com\"https://mail.comeriver.comC/a, then enter your email and password you created above.Cbr
		Cbr
		Ca class=\"pc-btn\" href=\"https://mail.comeriver.com\" target=\"_blank\"Check through Web&nbsp;MailC/aCbr
		&nbsp;C/li
		CliIntegrating Corporate Email to a Digital DeviceCbr
		Cbr
		When you integrate corporate email to your digital device, emails automatically synchronizes to your phone. So that you don't have to keep checking for new mails every time.Cbr
		&nbsp;
		Cul
			CliIntegrating to iPhone
			Col
				CliGo to iPhone \"Settings\"C/li
				CliSelect \"Passwords &amp; Accounts\"C/li
				CliSelect \"Add Account\"C/li
				CliSelect \"Other\"C/li
				CliSelect \"Add Mail Account
				Cul
					CliName: your full name e.g. John BelloC/li
					CliEmail: the email e.g. &nbsp;example@{{{pc_domain}}}C/li
					CliPassword; the email passwordC/li
					CliDescription: Anything to describe the emailC/li
				C/ul
				C/li
				CliSelect \"IMAP\" on the next sceenC/li
				CliIncoming Mail Server
				Cul
					CliHostname: mail.comeriver.comC/li
					CliUsername:&nbsp;the email e.g. &nbsp;example@{{{pc_domain}}}C/li
					CliPassword: the email passwordC/li
				C/ul
				C/li
				CliOutgoing Mail Server
				Cul
					CliHostname: mail.comeriver.comC/li
					CliUsername:&nbsp;the email e.g. &nbsp;example@{{{pc_domain}}}C/li
					CliPassword: the email passwordC/li
				C/ul
				C/li
				CliSelect \"Next\"C/li
				CliAfter verification, the email would have being added successfully. The email will come in automatically and you can use the \"Mail\" app on the phone to send and receive emails from the added account.Cbr
				&nbsp;C/li
			C/ol
			C/li
			CliIntegrating to AndroidCbr
			&nbsp;
			Col
				CliOpen the Gmail app and navigate to the&nbsp;CstrongSettingsC/strong&nbsp;section.C/li
				CliTap&nbsp;CstrongAdd accountC/strong.C/li
				CliTap&nbsp;CstrongPersonal (IMAP/POP)C/strong&nbsp;and then&nbsp;CstrongNextC/strong.C/li
				CliEnter your full email address&nbsp;e.g. &nbsp;example@{{{pc_domain}}} and tap&nbsp;CstrongNextC/strong.C/li
				CliChoose \"IMAP\"C/li
				CliEnter the password for your email address and tap&nbsp;CstrongNextC/strong.C/li
				Cli
				Cp id=\"incoming\"Incoming Server SettingsC/p

				Cul
					CliUsername:&nbsp;Enter your full email address&nbsp;e.g. &nbsp;example@{{{pc_domain}}}C/li
					CliPassword:&nbsp;Enter the password for your email accountC/li
					CliServer:&nbsp;mail.comeriver.comC/li
					CliPort&nbsp;and&nbsp;Security Type:
					Cul
						CliSecure - Port: 993 and Security Type: SSL/TLS (Accept all certificates)C/li
					C/ul
					C/li
					CliOnce the settings are entered, tap&nbsp;Next.Cbr
					&nbsp;C/li
				C/ul
				C/li
				CliOutgoing Server Settings
				Cul
					CliSelect&nbsp;CstrongRequire Sign-InC/strong.C/li
					CliCstrongUsername:C/strong&nbsp;Enter your full email address&nbsp;&nbsp;e.g. &nbsp;example@{{{pc_domain}}}C/li
					CliCstrongPassword:C/strong&nbsp;Enter the password for your email accountC/li
					CliCstrongServer:C/strong&nbsp;mail.comeriver.comC/li
					CliFor SMTP&nbsp;CstrongPortC/strong&nbsp;and&nbsp;CstrongSecurity TypeC/strong, choose:
					Cul
						CliSecure -&nbsp;CstrongPortC/strong&nbsp;465 and&nbsp;CstrongSecurity Type:C/strong&nbsp;SSL/TLS (Accept all certificates)C/li
					C/ul
					C/li
					CliOnce the settings are entered, tap&nbsp;CstrongNextC/strong.Cbr
					&nbsp;C/li
				C/ul
				C/li
			C/ol
			C/li
		C/ul
		C/li
	C/ul
	C/li
C/ul

Ch2Ca id=\"content\" name=\"content\"Adding ContentC/aC/h2

Cp&nbsp;C/p

CpAdding content to your website is incredibly easy. There are a number of ways to add content but the easiest ways are going to be highlighted here. More advanced methods are covered in other documentations articles and forums. Content on this website is categorized into three different types:Cbr
&nbsp;C/p

Col
	CliBranding ContentCbr
	Cbr
	This includes logo, icons, banners, site title and description set.&nbsp;The content here are not expected to change frequently. On most cases, the things set here are never changed.&nbsp;Cbr
	&nbsp;
	Cul
		CliCa class=\"pc-btn\" href=\"/pc-admin/Application_Personalization\" target=\"_blank\"Update Branding ContentC/aCbr
		&nbsp;C/li
	C/ul
	C/li
	CliStatic ContentCbr
	Cbr
	This contains some information some other content that may not change frequently but are&nbsp;likely to change more often than Branding Content. Examples are content of the About Us section, contact information etc. Basically, the items in this category are not related to one another. Static images are the photos on the website that can be easily replaced with new ones.Cbr
	&nbsp;
	Cul
		CliCa class=\"pc-btn\" href=\"/pc-admin/Ayoola_Page_Layout_ReplaceText\" target=\"_blank\"Update Static Text ContentC/a&nbsp;C/li
		CliCa class=\"pc-btn\" href=\"/pc-admin/Ayoola_Page_Layout_Images\" target=\"_blank\"Update Static ImagesC/a&nbsp;Cbr
		&nbsp;C/li
	C/ul
	C/li
	CliDynamic ContentCbr
	Cbr
	Dynamic contents are called \"posts\" because they do have related characteristics like titles, descriptions and image. Dynamic site content on PageCarton sites are content that are expected to change frequently. In fact, it allows one to add new dynamic content more frequently so that they could replace the old content on the website. When new dynamic content are added, they don't delete the old ones, the old ones may just be taken off the home page but they are also archived and can be accessed by search engines. This is a great way to build up site content to have a lot of information about the organization. Example dynamic contents are blog posts, event &amp; news, testimonials, products &amp; services etc. Dynamic content also have dynamic categories which can be easily updatedCbr
	&nbsp;
	Cul
		CliCa class=\"pc-btn\" href=\"/pc-admin/Application_Article_Publisher\" target=\"_blank\"Add New Dynamic ContentC/a&nbsp;Cbr
		Cbr
		Clicking the link above will display an array of the kind of dynamic posts available for this website. Just select \"Add a new item\" under the particular kind of post you want to add.Cbr
		Cbr
		On the first time a post is being added, one would have to create a profile:Cbr
		Cbr
		Display Name: Your full nameCbr
		Profile description: A profile description for yourselfCbr
		Profile URL: Url would be the page to create for your content like {{{pc_domain}}}/example&nbsp;Cbr
		Cbr
		On the post creation:Cbr
		Cbr
		\"Title\" is like the name of the content.Cbr
		\"Article Content\" would be text information of the content.&nbsp;Cbr
		\"Cover Photo\" would be the image that would accompany the content as the main photoCbr
		Cbr
		Other information may be required based on the type of content being added. Most of the fields would be self explanatory.Cbr
		&nbsp;C/li
		Cli style=\"text-align: left;\"To edit, delete or just change the settings for dynamic content:&nbsp;Cbr
		Cbr
		Ca class=\"pc-btn\" href=\"/pc-admin/Application_Article_List\" target=\"_blank\"Manage All Dynamic ContentC/aC/li
	C/ul
	C/li
C/ol

Cp&nbsp;C/p

Ch2Feedbacks &amp; Responses&nbsp;C/h2

Cp&nbsp;C/p

CpThere are features on the websites where users of the website will leave feedback on the website through pre-designed forms and other systems. When a user takes an action on the site, we have built a system to record the information in a database and such is accessible by the admin users of the website. Feedbacks could be in one of the following forms:Cbr
&nbsp;C/p

Cul
	CliCa class=\"pc-btn\" href=\"/pc-admin/Ayoola_Form_List\" target=\"_blank\"Custom Forms DataC/aC/li
	CliCa class=\"pc-btn\" href=\"/pc-admin/Application_ContactUs_List\" target=\"_blank\"Contact Us Form DataC/aC/li
	CliCa class=\"pc-btn\" href=\"/pc-admin/Application_Subscription_Checkout_Order_List\" target=\"_blank\"Product &amp; Service OrdersC/aC/li
	CliCa class=\"pc-btn\" href=\"/pc-admin/Application_User_UserEmail_Table\" target=\"_blank\"Email Opt-InC/aC/li
C/ul

Cp&nbsp;C/p
","preserved_content":"Cdiv
Cp&nbsp;C/p

Ch2Ca id=\"admin\" name=\"admin\"Admin accessC/aC/h2

Cp&nbsp;C/p
C/div

CpYour website allows you to have unlimited number of administrators – people, who would have access to the backend to perform specific administrative functions. Adding new pages, editing existing pages, reading contact form feedbacks, changing logos and favicon, creating posts or adding new products and services are some of the functions users are able to perform when they have admin access to the website.C/p

CpThe direct link to your administrative backend of your website is on Ca href=\"/pc-admin\"Control PanelC/a. By default, only the website developer&nbsp;would have access to the website admin panel to update the website&nbsp;but he could grant as many individuals as needed access to do the same tasks.C/p

Cp&nbsp;C/p

Cul
	Cli
	CpCstrongRequest admin accessC/strongCbr
	Cbr
	To be able to gain admin access to the website so you could update the website, you should request admin access. Only current admin users are able to grant admin access to others. If you are in doubt who would give you access to the website, you should talk to your website or service providers as they should have the capacity to do this for you. Meanwhile, any other person with admin access could create other admin users. Request Admin Access by following the link below.Cbr
	Cbr
	Ca class=\"pc-btn\" href=\"/widgets/Application_User_Creator/notify_us/create\" target=\"_blank\"Request Admin AccessC/aCbr
	Cbr
	All current admin will now be notified of your request and they would grant you access easily with a few clicksCbr
	&nbsp;C/p
	C/li
	Cli
	CpCstrongVisit Control PanelC/strongCbr
	Cbr
	You are able to administer your website from any internet enabled device where ever you are. Updates you make on the website would take effect immediately in real-time.Cbr
	Cbr
	Ca class=\"pc-btn\" href=\"/pc-admin\" target=\"_blank\"Go to Control PanelC/aC/p
	C/li
	Cli
	CpCstrongGranting Others Admin AccessC/strongCbr
	Cbr
	Any admin can grant admin access to other registered users of the website. Follow the following instructionsC/p

	Cul
		Cli
		CpAsk the individuals to create an account and request for admin access by filling this form:&nbsp;Ca href=\"/widgets/Application_User_Creator/notify_us/create\" target=\"_blank\"Request Admin Access - {{{pc_domain}}}/widgets/Application_User_Creator/notify_us/createC/aC/p
		C/li
		Cli
		CpGo to \"Ca href=\"/pc-admin/Application_User_List\"UsersC/a\" under Control Panel and locate the email address of the user you want to give admin access toC/p
		C/li
		Cli
		CpClick \"options\" then under the options that appear click \"Update Account\"&nbsp;C/p
		C/li
		Cli
		CpOn the Pop Up, set the \"Access Level\" to \"Owner\" and save the settingsCbr
		Cbr
		Ca class=\"pc-btn\" href=\"/pc-admin/Application_User_List\" style=\"word-spacing: 0px;\" target=\"_blank\"Go to UsersC/aC/p
		C/li
	C/ul
	C/li
C/ul

Cdiv&nbsp;C/div

Ch2Ca id=\"emails\" name=\"emails\"Corporate EmailsC/aC/h2

Cp&nbsp;C/p

CpFully hosted websites come with corporate emails and it is very likely that there is capacity for you to create emails like example@{{{pc_domain}}}. Only requirement in managing email accounts is Admin Access. If you don't have admin access and you would like to create a corporate email @{{{pc_domain}}}, you would need to either request admin access or ask someone who has the access to help create the email accounts you need. The email service for PageCarton websites are provided by ComeRiver Mail.C/p

	Ca class=\"pc-btn\" href=\"/pc-admin/Application_User_Email_List\" target=\"_blank\"Manage existing email accountsC/aCbr

	Cbr
	You have several options of checking your emails. The easiest to set you is to use our webmail interface to check your email. But you can as well integrate the email account to any digital device like your mobile phones and/or computer.&nbsp;Cbr
	Cbr
	&nbsp;
	Cul

		CliIntegrating Corporate Email to a Digital DeviceCbr
		Cbr
		When you integrate corporate email to your digital device, emails automatically synchronizes to your phone. So that you don't have to keep checking for new mails every time.Cbr
		&nbsp;
		Cul
			CliIntegrating to iPhone
			Col

				CliSelect \"Add Account\"C/li

				Cul

					CliEmail: the email e.g. &nbsp;example@{{{pc_domain}}}C/li

				C/ul

					CliUsername:&nbsp;the email e.g. &nbsp;example@{{{pc_domain}}}C/li

				C/ul

				CliSelect \"Next\"C/li
				CliAfter verification, the email would have being added successfully. The email will come in automatically and you can use the \"Mail\" app on the phone to send and receive emails from the added account.Cbr
				&nbsp;C/li

			C/li

			Col
				CliOpen the Gmail app and navigate to the&nbsp;CstrongSettingsC/strong&nbsp;section.C/li
				CliTap&nbsp;CstrongAdd accountC/strong.C/li

				Cp id=\"incoming\"Incoming Server SettingsC/p

				Cul
					CliUsername:&nbsp;Enter your full email address&nbsp;e.g. &nbsp;example@{{{pc_domain}}}C/li

Ch2Ca id=\"content\" name=\"content\"Adding ContentC/aC/h2

Cp&nbsp;C/p

CpAdding content to your website is incredibly easy. There are a number of ways to add content but the easiest ways are going to be highlighted here. More advanced methods are covered in other documentations articles and forums. Content on this website is categorized into three different types:Cbr
&nbsp;C/p

Col
	CliBranding ContentCbr
	Cbr
	This includes logo, icons, banners, site title and descriptions. This is also where the site theme type is set.&nbsp;The content here are not expected to change frequently. On most cases, the things set here are never changed.&nbsp;Cbr
	&nbsp;
	Cul
		CliCa class=\"pc-btn\" href=\"/pc-admin/Application_Personalization\" target=\"_blank\"Update Branding ContentC/aCbr
		&nbsp;C/li
	C/ul
	C/li

	This contains some information some other content that may not change frequently but are&nbsp;likely to change more often than Branding Content. Examples are content of the About Us section, contact information etc. Basically, the items in this category are not related to one another. Static images are the photos on the website that can be easily replaced with new ones.Cbr

		CliCa class=\"pc-btn\" href=\"/pc-admin/Ayoola_Page_Layout_Images\" target=\"_blank\"Update Static ImagesC/a&nbsp;Cbr
		&nbsp;C/li
	C/ul
	C/li
	CliDynamic ContentCbr
	Cbr
	Dynamic contents are called \"posts\" because they do have related characteristics like titles, descriptions and image. Dynamic site content on PageCarton sites are content that are expected to change frequently. In fact, it allows one to add new dynamic content more frequently so that they could replace the old content on the website. When new dynamic content are added, they don't delete the old ones, the old ones may just be taken off the home page but they are also archived and can be accessed by search engines. This is a great way to build up site content to have a lot of information about the organization. Example dynamic contents are blog posts, event &amp; news, testimonials, products &amp; services etc. Dynamic content also have dynamic categories which can be easily updatedCbr

	Cul

		Cbr
		Clicking the link above will display an array of the kind of dynamic posts available for this website. Just select \"Add a new item\" under the particular kind of post you want to add.Cbr
		Cbr
		On the first time a post is being added, one would have to create a profile:Cbr
		Cbr
		Display Name: Your full nameCbr
		Profile description: A profile description for yourselfCbr
		Profile URL: Url would be the page to create for your content like {{{pc_domain}}}/example&nbsp;Cbr
		Cbr
		On the post creation:Cbr
		Cbr
		\"Title\" is like the name of the content.Cbr
		\"Article Content\" would be text information of the content.&nbsp;Cbr
		\"Cover Photo\" would be the image that would accompany the content as the main photoCbr
		Cbr
		Other information may be required based on the type of content being added. Most of the fields would be self explanatory.Cbr
		&nbsp;C/li
		Cli style=\"text-align: left;\"To edit, delete or just change the settings for dynamic content:&nbsp;Cbr
		Cbr
		Ca class=\"pc-btn\" href=\"/pc-admin/Application_Article_List\" target=\"_blank\"Manage All Dynamic ContentC/aC/li
	C/ul
	C/li
C/ol

Ch2Feedbacks &amp; Responses&nbsp;C/h2

Cp&nbsp;C/p

CpThere are features on the websites where users of the website will leave feedback on the website through pre-designed forms and other systems. When a user takes an action on the site, we have built a system to record the information in a database and such is accessible by the admin users of the website. Feedbacks could be in one of the following forms:Cbr
&nbsp;C/p
